page.title: 11LOCAL PAPERS
page.content: {Some local papers There are several different newspapers, including the{Echo,}the {Entertainer,}the{Poole Advertiser, the{South Coast Express}and{What's On. The{Echo}is an evening newspaper. It costs 15p and it is published every day except Sunday. There are 2 editions, one early and one late. It contains local news, events, entertainment and advertising. The{Poole Advertiser}is very like the Echo but it has more advertising, is free and is delivered every Thursday. The{South Coast Express}is also free and comes on Friday. {What's On}costs 10p and gives information about the area, local events and entertainments. Most of these newspapers are local but you can find some in other areas.
